mapper.sql: SELECT A.rsnm, A.iboard, A.rsad, IFNULL(D.iuser,0) AS isFav FROM t_matzip A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.iuser, B.iboard FROM t_matzip_fav B INNER JOIN t_matzip C ON B.iboard = C.iboard WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser} ) D ON A.iboard = D.iboard
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_matzip_fav WHERE iboard = #{iboard}) as favCnt FROM t_matzip WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
SELECT A.*, B.nm as writer, B.profileImg FROM t_matzip_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard} ORDER BY A.icmt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_matzip_cmt ( iboard, iuser, cmt ) VALUES ( ${iboard}, ${iuser}, #{cmt} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(iboard) from t_matzip_fav WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND iuser=#{iuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_matzip_fav WHERE iboard=#{iboard} AND iuser=#{iuser}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_matzip_rev(iboard, iuser, irev, dt, memberct) VALUES(#{iboard}, #{iuser}, #{irev}, #{dt}, #{memberct})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_matzip_rev WHERE iboard=#{iboard} AND iuser=#{iuser}
